Author: mrdotboson#5783
Content:
Hey all! We‚Äôve just launched a Komodo group on MintFlint. https://mintflint.me/KMD 

Komodo community members can launch Beacons and inform each other about the project. 

It‚Äôs a more decentralised approach to networking and information distribution. We‚Äôre still in beta and the community drive within the Komodo ecosystem initially inspired me to start working on MintFlint. 

It would be cool to get your views so we can create a better experience for the Komodo community.

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @starcevic you are likely confusing "the last BTC ever created" with "the last BTC block mined". BTC will live on indefinitely. When the last BTC is mined, blocks will still be created, but the only incentivize for miners will be transaction fees.
